search.query: eventtype=mir sourcetype="w32scripting-persistence" $wild$ host=$hostname$ PersistenceItem.PersistenceType=$PersistenceType$ PersistenceItem.FileItem.FileExtension=$Extension$ PersistenceItem.FileItem.Md5sum=$MD5$ | eval PersistencePath=coalesce('PersistenceItem.LinkFilePath', 'PersistenceItem.RegPath', 'PersistenceItem.ServicePath', 'PersistenceItem.serviceDLL') | top limit=0 PersistenceItem.PersistenceType

table.title: Rare LinkFilePath (Link or exe in the user directory pointing to a file with an exe extension)

search.query: eventtype=mir sourcetype="w32scripting-persistence" $wild$ PersistenceItem.LinkFilePath="*users*" PersistenceItem.FileItem.FileExtension=exe host=$hostname$ PersistenceItem.PersistenceType=$PersistenceType$ PersistenceItem.FileItem.Md5sum=$MD5$ | eval PersistencePath=coalesce('PersistenceItem.LinkFilePath', 'PersistenceItem.RegPath', 'PersistenceItem.ServicePath', 'PersistenceItem.serviceDLL') | rare limit=0 PersistenceItem.LinkFilePath

table.title: Rare FilePath (exe file in the user directory)

search.query: eventtype=mir sourcetype="w32scripting-persistence" $wild$ PersistenceItem.FilePath="*users*" PersistenceItem.FileItem.FileExtension=exe host=$hostname$ PersistenceItem.PersistenceType=$PersistenceType$ PersistenceItem.FileItem.Md5sum=$MD5$ | eval PersistencePath=coalesce('PersistenceItem.LinkFilePath', 'PersistenceItem.RegPath', 'PersistenceItem.ServicePath', 'PersistenceItem.serviceDLL') | rare limit=0 PersistenceItem.FilePath
